solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public ListNode swapPairs(ListNode head) {--newline--        if ((head == null)||(head.next == null))--newline--            return head;--newline--        ListNode n = head.next;--newline--        head.next = swapPairs(head.next.next);--newline--        n.next = head;--newline--        return n;--newline--    }--newline--}
